name: <U.R.U.I> demo
description:
This game is demo for testing the main mechanic where your actions change UI elements that are into the game world.

controls:

  • Arrows: move
  • Space: jump
  • E: shoot
  • R; reload level
  • ESC: pause

Thanks for playing the game

Music by Tri-Tachyon - https://soundcloud.com/tri-tachyon/albums
